text: Ameronothridae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are about 8 genera and at least 30 described species in Ameronothridae. ==Genera== * Alaskozetes Hammer, 1955 * Ameronothrus Berlese, 1896 * Aquanothrus Engelbrecht, 1975 * Capillibates Hammer, 1966 * Chudalupia Wallwork, 1981 * Halozetes Berlese, 1916 * Podacarus Grandjean, 1955 * Pseudantarcticola Balogh, 1970 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Ameronothridae
